alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Lawrence (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 10:26PM EDT until June 14 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 359 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 1 AM EDT TUESDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST KENTUCKY BOYD CARTER LAWRENCE IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA BRAXTON IN CENTRAL WEST VIRGINIA CLAY NICHOLAS TAYLOR WEBSTER IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA BARBOUR DODDRIDGE HARRISON LEWIS POCAHONTAS RANDOLPH UPSHUR IN SOUTHERN WEST VIRGINIA BOONE FAYETTE LINCOLN LOGAN MCDOWELL MINGO RALEIGH WYOMING IN WESTERN WEST VIRGINIA CABELL WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALUM CREEK, ASHLAND, BECKLEY, BELINGTON, BRIDGEPORT, BUCKHANNON, BURNSVILLE, CANNONSBURG, CARTER CAVES STATE PARK, CEREDO, CHAPMANVILLE, CLARKSBURG, CLAY, CRAIGSVILLE, ELKINS, FAYETTEVILLE, GARY, GASSAWAY, GRAFTON, GRAYSON, GRAYSON LAKE STATE PARK, HAMLIN, HARTS, HUNTINGTON, KENOVA, LOGAN, LOUISA, MADISON, MAN, MARLINTON, MULLENS, OAK HILL, OCEANA, OLIVE HILL, PHILIPPI, PINEVILLE, RICHWOOD, SUMMERSVILLE, SUTTON, WAR, WAYNE, WEBSTER SPRINGS, WELCH, WEST UNION, WESTON, WILLIAMSON, AND YATESVILLE LAKE STATE PARK.
